section.title: Mac Install
section.content: This extension requires Vscode_Antimony_Setup (Silicon CPU Macbooks) or Python 3.9.13 (Intel Macbooks)and NodeJS to be installed before use. When installing Vscode_Antimony_Setup.pkg, right click on the pkg file and press open.
section.content1: Click open when the pop up appears.
section.content2: When installing Python 3.9.13 and NodeJS, proceed with the installations as is. No changes are needed to be made. Once installed, restart Visual Code Studio.
